page.title: 04Education in Elton/Birchover
page.content: Most children from Elton and Gratton attend Elton Primary School from 5-11 years with part-time schooling from about 4 years. Before this they may attend a playgroup at Winster. At 11 they travel to Highfields School, Matlock on the Silver Service bus. The Birchover schoolchildren attend Birchover Infants School until 7 years From 7-11 years they go to Stanton Primary School and then on to Lady Manners Comprehensive School, Bakewell. Many pupils progress to Further and Higher Education. In recent years some have graduated in Mathematics, Food Science, Sociology and Education whilst others have obtained City & Guilds qualifications in Hotel and Catering, Agriculture, Hairdressing, Community Care, Business Studies and Engineering.
